channel.title: Client error
channel.description:
When i log into my client i get this error[code] Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection
[/code] Thats my client error
Every time i log in... it just dc's me.... and logs me out and i retry same thing happens..
And this is the error i get in the run server box.
[code]Kool: character file not found. Game saved for player Kool ClientHandler: Client Kool disconnected (127.0.0.1) [/code]
Tell me what's going on and how to solve it thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 22, 2008, 05:55:04 pm[/size][hr]Somone please Help....

item.title: Client error
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

When i log into my client i get this error[code]
Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection
Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection
Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection
Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection
Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection
Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection
Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection

[/code]
Thats my client error

Every time i log in… it just dc’s me… and logs me out and i retry same thing happens…

And this is the error i get in the run server box.

Kool: character file not found. Game saved for player Kool ClientHandler: Client Kool disconnected (127.0.0.1)

Tell me what’s going on and how to solve it thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 22, 2008, 05:55:04 pm[/size][hr]Somone please Help…
